EmailTemplate.name: Meeting (1559162077.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting (1559162077.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Brent:
Have you considered what impact the global trade war will have on indirect spend categories? In just five days, the US increased tariffs on $US200 billion worth of Chinese goods from 10 to 25 per cent. On May 16th, Walmart CFO Brett Biggs told Reuters that higher tariffs will result in increased prices for consumers. I’m looking forward to speaking with you on Wed June 19th, to present strategies around mitigating the impact of this global situation. If this timing doesn’t work, please provide an alternate. Best, Erica
Erica Kocijancic | Director, Business Development 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7E-mail: EricaKocijancic@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:EricaKocijancic@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 647 631 5196 OFFICE SUPPLIES | INTERIORS & FURNITURE | PRINT & DOCUMENTS | FACILITY RESOURCES | TECHNOLOGY
